Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown (almost completely worn); exterior, from top: maeander pattern band; wide and narrow bands; reserved area; narrow and wide bands; tip of ray.
Curator's comments: The number 113 is written in pencil on the exterior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0073) (phase 2)
